TopicTitle: Testing out my new Eve wet lab. Almost perfect

Articles.Content:
So I decided to launch a giant egg to Eve. No but seriously I built a lab with the intention of collecting atmospheric data and the data from the oceans before transporting a kerbal up to one of the highest peaks to collect land data and then make an easy launch to orbit. All went well until I hit the eject stage. Guess I have to change the angle on that seperatron!

Javascript is disabled. View full album
